item.title: CVE-2024-30532|2024-04-02T18:18:17.855Z -- Builderall Team -- Builderall Builder for WordPress
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Builderall Team Builderall Builder for WordPress.This issue affects Builderall Builder for WordPress: from n/a through 2.0.1.
